description:
This tube is compatible with underarm or standard reservoir routing.

  • Plug-N-Play connector lets you remove the hose quickly
  • Made from thermoplastic elastomer, a recyclable plastic that doesn't produce harmful toxins during manufacture
  • Rocket valve is standard with Salomon soft reservoirs
  • 90cm length
  • PVC and BPA free
name: Salomon Soft Reservoir Tube - Unisex
